title: Textile, ca. 1770
medium:
Medium: silk on silk
Technique: satin stitch embroidery
description: Each fragment shows a portion of a design of a bouquet of tulips and small flowers, incomplete bouquets at either side. Worked in satin stitch.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1770.
ca. 1770. Medium: silk on silk
Technique: satin stitch embroidery. Gift of Sarah Cooper Hewitt. 1931-66-93-a,b.
